apihelp-donate-summary: This API allow you to submit a donation to the Wikimedia Foundation using a variety of payment processors.
apihelp-donate-param-gateway: Which payment gateway to use - adyen, ingenico, etc.
apihelp-donate-param-contact_id: ID of the donor in CiviCRM.
apihelp-donate-param-contact_hash: Hash of the donor in CiviCRM, used for verification. Mandatory when contact_id is given.
apihelp-donate-param-debug_messages: Any debug messages to add to the log.
apihelp-donate-param-processor_form: Which of the processor's form options to use.
apihelp-donate-param-order_id: Order ID (if a donation has already been started).
apihelp-donate-param-recurring: Indicates that the transaction is meant to be recurring.
apihelp-donate-param-variant: Indicates which form variant the donor has filled out.
apihelp-donate-param-opt_in: Indicates that the donor has opted in to fundraising emails.
apihelp-donate-param-uselang: Language code to use in the front end
apihelp-logPaymentsFormError-summary: This API logs client-side donation form errors.
apihelp-logPaymentsFormError-param-file: File that the error occurred in
apihelp-logPaymentsFormError-param-line: Line on which the error occurred
apihelp-logPaymentsFormError-param-col: Column on which the error occurred
apihelp-logRecurUpgradeFormError-summary: This API logs client-side recurring upgrade form errors.
apihelp-logRecurUpgradeFormError-param-f: File that the error occurred in
apihelp-logRecurUpgradeFormError-param-l: Line on which the error occurred
apihelp-logRecurUpgradeFormError-param-c: Column on which the error occurred
apihelp-requestNewChecksumLink-summary: This API requests a new link for a donor preference page
apihelp-requestNewChecksumLink-param-con: CiviCRM contact ID for which to request the link
apihelp-requestNewChecksumLink-param-pag: Page to which we want a link, e.g. RecurUpgrade or EmailPreferences
apihelp-requestNewChecksumLink-param-sub: Subpage to which we want a link. Optional.
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-contact_ha: Hash of the donor in CiviCRM, used for verification. Mandatory when contact_id is given.
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-contact_id: ID of the donor in CiviCRM.
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-debug_mess: Any debug messages to add to the log.
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-encrypted_: Bank account number, encrypted by Adyen's client-side code
Bank location ID, encrypted by Adyen's client-side code
Credit card number, encrypted by Adyen's client-side code
Card expiry month, encrypted by Adyen's client-side code
Card expiry year, encrypted by Adyen's client-side code
CVV, encrypted by Adyen's client-side code
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-gateway: Which payment gateway to use - adyen, ingenico, etc.
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-opt_in: Indicates that the donor has opted in to fundraising emails.
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-order_id: Order ID (if a donation has already been started).
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-payment_to: Token for the payment to use.
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-processor_: Which of the processor's form options to use.
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-recurring: Indicates that the transaction is meant to be recurring.
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-uselang: Language code to use in the front end
apihelp-di_donate_adyen-param-variant: Indicates which form variant the donor has filled out.
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-contact_h: Hash of the donor in CiviCRM, used for verification. Mandatory when contact_id is given.
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-contact_i: ID of the donor in CiviCRM.
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-debug_mes: Any debug messages to add to the log.
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-gateway: Which payment gateway to use - adyen, ingenico, etc.
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-opt_in: Indicates that the donor has opted in to fundraising emails.
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-order_id: Order ID (if a donation has already been started).
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-processor: Which of the processor's form options to use.
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-recurring: Indicates that the transaction is meant to be recurring.
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-upi_id: ID in India's UPI payment method.
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-uselang: Language code to use in the front end
apihelp-di_donate_dlocal-param-variant: Indicates which form variant the donor has filled out.
apihelp-di_donate_gravy-param-contact_ha: Hash of the donor in CiviCRM, used for verification. Mandatory when contact_id is given.
apihelp-di_donate_gravy-param-contact_id: ID of the donor in CiviCRM.
apihelp-di_donate_gravy-param-debug_mess: Any debug messages to add to the log.
apihelp-di_donate_gravy-param-gateway: Which payment gateway to use - adyen, ingenico, etc.
apihelp-di_donate_gravy-param-opt_in: Indicates that the donor has opted in to fundraising emails.
apihelp-di_donate_gravy-param-order_id: Order ID (if a donation has already been started).
apihelp-di_donate_gravy-param-processor_: Which of the processor's form options to use.
apihelp-di_donate_gravy-param-recurring: Indicates that the transaction is meant to be recurring.
apihelp-di_donate_gravy-param-uselang: Language code to use in the front end
apihelp-di_donate_gravy-param-variant: Indicates which form variant the donor has filled out.
apihelp-di_donate_braintree-param-contac: Hash of the donor in CiviCRM, used for verification. Mandatory when contact_id is given.
ID of the donor in CiviCRM.
apihelp-di_donate_braintree-param-debug_: Any debug messages to add to the log.
apihelp-di_donate_braintree-param-gatewa: Which payment gateway to use - adyen, ingenico, etc.
Session ID to use for Braintree API calls
apihelp-di_donate_braintree-param-opt_in: Indicates that the donor has opted in to fundraising emails.
apihelp-di_donate_braintree-param-order_: Order ID (if a donation has already been started).
apihelp-di_donate_braintree-param-proces: ID of the donor at the payment processor
Which of the processor's form options to use.
apihelp-di_donate_braintree-param-recurr: Indicates that the transaction is meant to be recurring.
apihelp-di_donate_braintree-param-uselan: Language code to use in the front end
apihelp-di_donate_braintree-param-user_n: Donor's username in the payment app
apihelp-di_donate_braintree-param-varian: Indicates which form variant the donor has filled out.
apihelp-di_recurring_convert-summary: This API is used when a donor agrees to add a monthly donation after completing a successful one-time donation.
apihelp-di_recurring_convert-param-amoun: The amount of the monthly donation.
apihelp-di_recurring_convert-param-decli: Set to true when donor declines to add a monthly donation
apihelp-di_recurring_convert-param-gatew: Which payment gateway to use - adyen, ingenico, etc.
apihelp-employerSearch-summary: This API allow you to search for employers participating in the WMF matching gifts program.
apihelp-employerSearch-param-employer: Which employer to search for e.g. Red Cross, WWF, Salvation Army, etc.
apihelp-di_applesession_adyen-summary: Allows requesting an Apple Pay session directly from Apple
apihelp-di_applesession_adyen-param-gate: Gateway to use to process the payment
apihelp-di_applesession_adyen-param-vali: Apple URL we need to hit to validate the session
apihelp-getPaymentMethods-summary: Returns available payment methods based on country
apihelp-getPaymentMethods-param-country: Country to get payment methods for
apihelp-submitPayment-summary: Submits a payment based on parameters sent
apihelp-submitPayment-param-app_version: Version of the application used to submit the payment
apihelp-submitPayment-param-opt_in: Indicates that the donor has opted in to fundraising emails.
apihelp-submitPayment-param-pay_the_fee: Indicates that the donor paid a few percent extra to cover processing fees.
apihelp-submitPayment-param-recurring: Indicates that the transaction is meant to be recurring.
apihelp-di_applesession_gravy-summary: Allows requesting an Apple Pay session directly from Apple on behalf of the Gravy transaction
apihelp-di_applesession_gravy-param-gate: Gateway to use to process the payment
apihelp-di_applesession_gravy-param-vali: Apple URL we need to hit to validate the session
